Name: Boys Multi Finger Puppet
Description: Turn playtime into sensory learning with the Allen Solly Junior multi-colored finger puppets for boys. Crafted from soft polyester felt, these puppets are perfect for imaginative play while also promoting creativity and fine motor skills development. Ideal for enhancing social interactions and story-telling skills, these puppets provide hours of engaging entertainment for kids. Explore the playful world of puppetry and encourage your child`s playful curiosity with the high-quality finger puppets from Allen Solly Junior.
